name: The Search (itch) (Danilock)
description:
USED A LOT OF ITCH.IO CONTENT.

Enjoy this short adventure with Ryan and help him to reach the castle and know what's happening in the city.

CONTROLS: Use (W, S, A, D) to move and (J, K, L) to make attacks.

With L: you knock the enemies who have an orange circlo in the head to the air.

This is the fourth game I made and I used art from ITCH.IO and music composed by A-mattashi.

I hope you like the game!!!
